  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_80612</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation des plis de montagnes</string>
            <string language="en">Formation of fold mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Falte Berge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de montanhas da dobra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione delle montagne del popolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των βουνών πτυχών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de las montañas del doblez</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre la formation des plis de montagnes quand la croûte continentale et la croûte océanique sont poussées les uns contre les autres causant la subduction de la croûte océanique.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the formation of fold mountains when the continental crust and the oceanic crust are pushed against each other causing the subduction of the oceanic crust.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte basaltique</string>
            <string language="en">basaltic crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte continentale</string>
            <string language="en">continental crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pli de montagnes</string>
            <string language="en">fold mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte granitique</string>
            <string language="en">granitic crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">magma</string>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte océanique</string>
            <string language="en">Oceanic crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">subduction</string>
            <string language="en">subduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">volcans</string>
            <string language="en">volcanoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Anordnung der Falte 
Berge, wenn die kontinentale Kruste und die ozeanische Kruste 
gegeneinander den Subduction der ozeanischen Kruste verursachend 
gedrückt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra a formação de montanhas
da dobra quando a crosta continental e a crosta oceanic são 
empurradas uns contra os outros que causam o subduction da crosta 
oceanic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra la formazione delle 
montagne del popolare quando la crosta continentale e la crosta 
oceanica sono spinte faccia a faccia che causano il subduction della 
crosta oceanica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό των 
βουνών πτυχών όταν ωθούνται η ηπειρωτική κρούστα και η ωκεάνεια
κρούστα η μια ενάντια στην άλλη προκαλώντας subduction της 
ωκεάνειας κρούστας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra la formación de las 
montañas del doblez cuando la corteza continental y la corteza 
oceánica se empujan cara a cara que causan el subduction de la 
corteza oceánica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Basaltkruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kontinentale Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">falten Sie Berge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">granitartige Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozeanische Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Subduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
